title: Jonathan Ashworth – 2021 Comments on Government’s Handling of Covid-19
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Jonathan Ashworth, the Shadow Secretary of State for Health and Social Care, on 27 May 2021.
content: Isn’t the truth that his failures on testing and PPE contributed to Covid spreading like ‘wildfire’ in care homes?
It is clear to the country and the families who lost loved ones that we have been let down by this Government, this Prime Minister, and this Health Secretary.
The truth matters. The least these families and the country now deserve is clear answers from the Health Secretary and Prime Minister today.
